EmailTemplate.description: what you get email for expired subs, $599 special until April 15, 2015
EmailTemplate.name: RE-capture April 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: What you're missing
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We miss you in the Compliance community.
I just received approval to extend a one-year special subscription to you at 50% off the regular rate. As a former subscriber, take advantage of this special offer for $599.
Let me know by April 15, 2015—I'd be happy to help get your subscription started again.
Free benefits ✓ Thought Leadership downloads ✓ Event of the Week alerts ✓ Live weekly CPE webcasts
Subscriber benefits ✓ Unlimited access to award-winning subscriber-only content ✓ Monthly print issue ✓ Access to the digital edition archive ✓ Dozens of On-Demand CPE Library webcasts ✓ Discounts to Compliance Week events ✓ My CW—pinning and sharing ✓ Access to the Resource Center databases ✓ Tuesday's Compliance Week eNewsletter ✓ Weekend Edition's "plain English" digest
